prompts: Create a ground-type Pokemon that burrows underground and has a cute face.
I want a small, brown Pokemon with a round body and a playful personality.
Generate a Pokemon with a pink nose and a tough exterior, perfect for digging.
Make a Pokemon that lives underground and has distinctive rock features around it.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon that can swiftly navigate through soil and rocks.
Design a friendly Pokemon that enjoys playing in grasslands and caves.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a mole, with strong digging abilities.
